sections.pali: ‘‘Dibbaṃ subhaṃ dhāresi vaṇṇadhātuṃ, vehāyasaṃ tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe; Mukhañca te kimayo pūtigandhaṃ, khādanti kiṃ kammamakāsi pubbe’’.
‘‘Samaṇo ahaṃ pāpotiduṭṭhavāco [pāpo duṭṭhavāco (sī.), pāpo dukkhavāco (syā. pī.)], tapassirūpo mukhasā asaññato; Laddhā ca me tapasā vaṇṇadhātu, mukhañca me pesuṇiyena pūti.
‘‘Tayidaṃ tayā nārada sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, Anukampakā ye kusalā vadeyyuṃ; ‘Mā pesuṇaṃ mā ca musā abhāṇi, Yakkho tuvaṃ hohisi kāmakāmī’’’ti. Pūtimukhapetavatthu tatiyaṃ.
